description: Values returned by Rapid.CDN slave instanciation

domain.description: Base domain used by the instance

key-generate-auth-url.description: URL to GET once auth for key-upload-url

key-upload-url.description: URL to PUT PEM bundle of certificate and key

log-access-url.description: List of URLs to access logs

request-error-list.description: In case if slave has been rejected by master or has error in the request, the list contains information about each problem

warning-list.description: List of warning found during the request.

kedifa-caucase-url.description: URL to caucase used by KeDiFa

backend-client-caucase-url.description: URL to caucase used by authentication to the backend.
